body:
Comment 1: 
The Go Playground is supposed to == the Go source code.
It's just a bug in our release process that it has lagged behind.

Announcing Google App Engine releases on go-announce
sounds like a good idea to me, but I might not understand
the logistics.  Leaving for adg (away this week).
_Owner changed to @adg._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._
